brainly_data.question: You purchase a new desktop computer for $2,200. you put a 6% down payment and $100 per month on a 24 month purchase plan. determine the total finance
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: You purchase a new desktop computer for $2,200. you put a 6% down payment and $100 per month on a 24 month purchase plan. determine the total finance
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
The total finance will be as follows:
Total=(downpayment)+(future payments)
Down payment=6/100*2200=$132
Total future payments=(monthly payments)*(number of months)
=24*100
=$2400
thus the total payment will be:
2400+132
=$2532
